Have an extra Baker available. Asking $SOLD obo. Anyone saying sold gets priority over ongoing negotiations.

The eyelash in the back scan is not included. Card back is a Sweet Cap 350/30.

Will also consider trades for EPDGs I need or upgrades and can do trade+cash swap either way.  Just let me know what you got.
